name: Gadget Panic
description:
Godzilla is attacking the city! Create robots to take him down.

Originally created by Katie, John, and a very special artist guest – Douglas Tarasconi – for Ludum Dare 31 in 48 hours.

Gadget Panic features:

* Non stop conveyor belt of fun

* Build your own bots

* 16 unique robot accessories ready to fight back

* Full city destruction

* Not just one, but a whole family of Godzillas!
